howItWorks.subtitle: How it works
howItWorks.title: How to Use
howItWorks.step1Desc: Upload a photo of the face you want to achieve. Celebrity, model, or AI-generated ideal face.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Use a front-facing photo. Better accuracy with good lighting.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Compare before/after for the whole face. Toggle individual parts (eyes, nose, mouth, eyebrows) on/off for detailed comparison.

features.subtitle: Features
features.title: Features
features.aiDesc: Natural face blending powered by AI. Seamless results while preserving skin texture and lighting.
features.partsDesc: Toggle eyes, eyebrows, nose, and mouth individually. Instantly see "What if I only changed the nose?"
features.compareDesc: Switch between original and transformed faces. Great reference material for consultations.
features.privacyDesc: Uploaded photos are automatically deleted. No sharing with third parties for peace of mind.
